thread.title: Elizabeth Garvey
thread.title_full: Players Choice Videogames reviewed by Elizabeth Garvey

author: Elizabeth Garvey
title: Elizabeth Garvey
text: The game arrived quickly and in perfect condition! I haven't played this game since I was a kid, so I'm thrilled with how quickly it arrived and that it worked perfectly. The case was in perfect condition and included all the original booklets! I would definitely buy from this seller again.
